node.title: Ardeshir Zahedi, Irrepressible Iranian Diplomat, Dies at 93
node.description: While he enabled business deals worth billions of dollars, he also hosted lavish parties, led conga lines through his embassy and dated Elizabeth Taylor.

node.title: Solskjaer expected to go
node.description: Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea described his side's 4-1 loss against Watford as "embarrassing" and "another nightmare".

node.title: Rugby: France demolish All Blacks 40-25 in Paris
node.description: Three tries in the second half were not enough for the All Blacks to prevent a heavy loss to France at Stade de France in Paris this morning.

node.title: Murder investigation underway after man, 22, dies in Auckland
node.description: The man was dropped off at a Takanini medical centre about 12.45pm with critical injuries and was taken to Middlemore Hospital where he died shortly after.

node.title: Transcript: Derrick Johnson on "Face the Nation"
node.description: The following is a transcript of an interview with NAACP President and CEO Derrick Johnson that aired Sunday, November 21, 2021, on "Face the Nation."

node.title: Transcript: Kirsten Gillibrand on "Face the Nation"
node.description: The following is a transcript of an interview with New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand that aired Sunday, November 21, 2021, on "Face the Nation."

node.title: Transcript: Ted Cruz on "Face the Nation"
node.description: The following is a transcript of an interview with Texas Republican Sen. Ted Cruz that aired Sunday, November 21, 2021, on "Face the Nation."

node.title: Five Ways to Exercise Your Thankfulness Muscles
node.description: Feeling grateful does not always happen naturally.

node.title: Lincoln vs. the Constitution? Not So Fast.
node.description: Lincoln, the Emancipation Proclamation and the Constitution. Also: A call for gratitude; arena as metaphor; disparate energy burdens.

node.title: Thanksgiving Will Cost More This Year. That Could Cost Democrats, Too.
node.description: Rising prices for gas and a holiday meal could come back to bite Democrats, who fear that inflation may upend their electoral prospects in the 2022 midterms.

node.title: Texas Student Hits Teacher in Viral Video, Tells Her Mom: 'She's Black and Pissing Me Off'
node.description: "I need you to get over here now because this teacher is about to get f***** up if she doesn't get the f*** away from me," the student tells her mother on the phone.

node.title: Fox News Host Cites Buttigieg's Height While Knocking His Potential to Become President
node.description: Jesse Watters predicted there would be a "civil war" among Democrats leading up to the 2024 presidential election.

node.title: GOP Senator Cramer Dismisses Trump Criticism Over Infrastructure Vote, Touts Bill's Merits
node.description: "I don't make my decision on legislation based on whether it hurts or helps Donald Trump," the North Dakota lawmaker said.

node.title: What to Cook This Week
node.description: Some tips for thawing turkey and a road map for meals that aren’t Thanksgiving-themed.

node.title: Aura Mason Luxe Digital Photo Frame Shows Off Stunning Memories
node.description: The Aura Mason Luxe is an updated digital frame with higher resolution and audio with its video playback.

node.title: VIDEO: Chilling Out: Polar Bears Delight At Huge Frozen Salmon Birthday Cake
node.description: Finja celebrates turning two in Vienna's Schönbrunn Zoo with a tasty treat.

node.title: T-Pain mixes a beer-and-ice cream cocktail
node.description: The Grammy-winning performer, whose hits include "Bartender" and "Blame It (On The Alcohol)," now has a book of cocktail recipes: "Can I Mix You a Drink? 50 Cocktails From My Life & Career."

node.title: As Pandemic Evictions Rise, Spaniards Declare ‘War’ on Wall Street Landlords
node.description: Protesters in Barcelona are pushing back against foreign investment firms that have bought up thousands of homes over the past decade and are forcing out residents who can’t pay the rent.

node.title: Peng Shuai: China Still Facing Backlash After Missing Tennis Star Shown in Photos, Videos
node.description: Peng has not been seen or heard from in public since she wrote a blog post on November 2 in which she accused former Chinese vice premier Zhang Gaoli of sexual assault.

node.title: Pregnant Woman Shot and Killed as She Leaves Her Own Baby Shower: Police
node.description: Authorities said it appeared that someone was "targeting" the woman when they shot and killed her and her unborn child Saturday evening.

node.title: Poll: Rising prices take toll on Americans' wallets, and Biden's numbers
node.description: The president is also facing criticism on his handling of immigration.

node.title: "The Humans": A Thanksgiving feast of family drama
node.description: The new movie, adapted from the Tony Award-winning play, is a story familiar to any family that has gathered together for a bumpy holiday celebration. The cast reunited to tell "Sunday Morning" what they are most grateful for this Thanksgiving.

node.title: Conspiracist or Reformist: Which One Are You When Disaster Strikes?
node.description: From the Salem witch trials to the Astroworld disaster, conspiracy theories and reformist narratives have battled for dominance in the American consciousness.

node.title: More Asian countries slowly reopen their borders and welcome vaccinated travelers.
node.description: The easing of restrictions comes as the holiday travel season is about to begin.

node.title: VIDEO: How Honey Bees Raise The Alarm When Murder Hornets Attack
node.description: A newly documented "harsh and irregular" sound is emitted by honey bees to rally defenses when giant hornets attack.

node.title: Mike Lindell Calls for Protest Outside Fox News Despite MyPillow Advertising on Network
node.description: The Trump loyalist called the network "controlled opposition" even as it confirmed MyPillow ads continue to run across Fox News.

node.title: History and tacos served at the Mitla Café
node.description: During the Depression, Doña Lucia Rodriguez opened the doors of her Mexican restaurant in San Bernardino, Calif., along old Route 66, because she didn't want family members to go hungry. Since then, an entire community has been nourished.

node.title: Orecchiette: The art of pasta
node.description: In Bari, the capital of the Puglia region of Italy, pastamakers adhere to traditions to create the local favorite, the distinctively-shaped "little ears" pasta.

node.title: The Automat: A look back at the future of dining
node.description: For much of the 20th century, Horn & Hardart's gleaming, self-service eateries dispensed comfort foods, pies and coffee at the drop of a coin.

node.title: "Fancy Like": Walker Hayes' ode to Applebee's
node.description: The song put the singer-songwriter on the top of the country charts – and put the restaurant chain on the tip of almost everyone's tongue – but the married father of six has had a long, sometimes painful journey to double-platinum success.
